statements: SELECT * FROM public_opinion_data;
SELECT id, public_policy_issue FROM public_opinion_data;
SELECT public_opinion FROM public_opinion_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_data WHERE sentiment_analysis = 'positive';
SELECT id, public_policy_issue, public_opinion FROM public_opinion_data WHERE sentiment_analysis = 'negative';
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_data WHERE sentiment_analysis = 'positive' ORDER BY public_policy_issue ASC, id DESC;
SELECT id, public_policy_issue FROM public_opinion_data WHERE public_opinion LIKE '%support%' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT public_opinion FROM public_opinion_data WHERE sentiment_analysis = 'negative' AND LENGTH(public_opinion) > 50;
SELECT public_policy_issue, sentiment_analysis FROM public_opinion_data WHERE sentiment_analysis IN ('positive', 'neutral') ORDER BY sentiment_analysis DESC, public_policy_issue ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT public_policy_issue FROM public_opinion_data WHERE public_opinion IS NULL OR public_opinion = '' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM PublicOpinionData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT topic, opinion FROM PublicOpinionData WHERE topic = 'Politics';
SELECT id, date FROM PublicOpinionData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT id, analysis_result FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE topic = 'Technology';
SELECT * FROM PublicOpinionData WHERE topic = 'Politics';
SELECT topic, opinion FROM PublicOpinionData WHERE date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, sentiment_score FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT topic, analysis_result FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE id = 123456 AND topic LIKE '%Economy%' ORDER BY id ASC;

SELECT * FROM PublicOpinionData JOIN SentimentAnalysis ON PublicOpinionData.id = SentimentAnalysis.id WHERE PublicOpinionData.date <= '2021-09-30' ORDER BY SentimentAnalysis.sentiment_score DESC, PublicOpinionData.date ASC;
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_data
SELECT name, age, opinion_text FROM public_opinion_data WHERE political_affiliation = 'Democrat'
SELECT id, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM sentiment_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC
SELECT organization, contact_email FROM policy_advocates WHERE id > 5
SELECT id, sentiment_score, analysis_result FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score >= 0.6
SELECT id, name, age, political_affiliation FROM public_opinion_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT name, organization, contact_email FROM policy_advocates WHERE organization = 'XYZ Advocacy' OR organization = 'ABC Group';
SELECT name, opinion_text FROM public_opinion_data WHERE opinion_text ILIKE '%important%' OR opinion_text ILIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT public_opinion_id, sentiment_score, analysis_date FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_data;
SELECT id, topic, sentiment_score FROM public_opinion_data ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_label = 'positive';
SELECT advocate_name, organization, email FROM policy_advocates WHERE id = 2;
SELECT action_taken, timestamp FROM policy_advocacy_logs ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.7;
SELECT advocate_name, organization FROM policy_advocates ORDER BY advocate_name ASC;
SELECT opinion FROM public_opinion_data WHERE topic = 'Climate Change' AND sentiment_score < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM policy_advocacy_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';

SELECT pa.advocate_name, pad.description FROM policy_advocates AS pa JOIN sentiment_analysis AS sa ON pa.id = sa.sentiment_key JOIN policy_advocacy_logs AS pal ON pa.id = pal.advocate_id JOIN policy_advocacy_logs AS pap ON sa.id = pap.policy_id ORDER BY pa.advocate_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_data;
SELECT topic, opinion FROM public_opinion_data WHERE sentiment_analysis IS NOT NULL;
SELECT leader, location FROM advocacy_groups ORDER BY leader ASC;
SELECT issue_name, category FROM policy_issues WHERE category = 'Health' LIMIT 5;
SELECT action_description, action_date FROM advocacy_actions WHERE action_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_data WHERE opinion = 'positive';
SELECT * FROM advocacy_groups WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY leader DESC;
SELECT issue_name, category FROM policy_issues WHERE issue_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT analysis_date, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT action_description, action_date, group_name FROM advocacy_actions INNER JOIN advocacy_groups ON advocacy_actions.group_id = advocacy_groups.group_id;
